title: satyavantarigidu
sahitya:
satyavantarigidu kAlavalla


anupallavi

  duSTa janarige subhikSa kAla


caraNam 1    hari smaraNe mADuvage kSayavAguva kAla parama pApigaLige subhikSa kAla 
sthiravAda pativrateya pararu nindipa kAla dharage jAreyaLa koNDADuva kAla
    caraNam 2    upakAra mADidare apakarisuva kAla sakalavu tiLidavage durbhikSa kAla 
patisutaru embavaru nambalariyada kAla saDeyallavide viparIta kAla
    caraNam 3    dharmava mADuvage nirmUlavAguva kAla karmi pAtakarige bahu saukhya kAla 
nirmalAtmaka siri purandara viTTalana marmadoLu bhajisalariyada kAlavayya
